entity_types.name: Person
entity_types.description: An individual involved with the company.

entity_types.name: Product
entity_types.description: A product offered by the company.

entity_types.name: OperatingSystem
entity_types.description: An operating system used by Apple products.

entity_types.name: Service
entity_types.description: A service offered by the company.

entity_types.name: Location
entity_types.description: A geographical location associated with the company.

entity_types.name: Industry
entity_types.description: The sector the company operates in.

relations.name: CEOOf
relations.description: The person is the CEO of the company.
relations.detail: Indicates the CEO of a company.

relations.name: FoundedBy
relations.description: The company was founded by the person.
relations.detail: Indicates the founder of a company.

relation_groups.name: ProductInformation
relation_groups.description: Relationships related to products and operating systems.

relations.name: ProductOf
relations.description: The product is offered by the company.
relations.detail: Indicates the company that produces a product.

relations.name: RunsOn
relations.description: The product runs on the operating system.
relations.detail: Indicates the operating system a product uses.

relation_groups.name: CompanyOperations
relation_groups.description: Relationships related to company operations and services.

relations.name: OperatesIn
relations.description: The company operates in the location.
relations.detail: Indicates the location where a company operates.

relations.name: Headquarters
relations.description: The company's headquarters are in the location.
relations.detail: Indicates the location of a company's headquarters.

relations.name: Offers
relations.detail: Indicates the services offered by a company.
